title: Athletism — Biking (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Aerobic Base
equipment: Road bike, track bike, or MTB (depending on discipline)
Power meter, HR monitor, GPS head unit
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Plyo boxes, resistance bands, medicine balls
goal: Rebuild aerobic foundation, joint mobility, and tissue capacity.

main: Strength: Back Squat 4x6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg

notes: Week 1: Z2 60' rides 3x. Week 2: +10% volume, add gym eccentrics.
